label: CPU Hours: Per Job
description:
The average CPU hours (number of CPU cores x wall time hours) per Screwdriver job.
For each job, the CPU usage is aggregated. For example, if a job used 1000 CPUs for one minute, it would be aggregated as 1000 CPU minutes or 16.67 CPU hours.

label: CPU Hours: Total
description:
The total CPU hours (number of CPU cores x wall time hours) used by Screwdriver jobs.
For each job, the CPU usage is aggregated. For example, if a job used 1000 CPUs for one minute, it would be aggregated as 1000 CPU minutes or 16.67 CPU hours.

label: GPU Count: Per Job
description:
The average job size per Screwdriver job.
Job Size: The number of GPUs used by a (parallel) job.

label: GPU Hours: Per Job
description:
The average GPU hours (number of GPU cores x wall time hours) per Screwdriver job.
For each job, the GPU usage is aggregated. For example, if a job used 1000 GPUs for one minute, it would be aggregated as 1000 GPU minutes or 16.67 GPU hours.

label: GPU Hours: Total
description:
The total GPU hours (number of GPUs x wall time hours) used by Screwdriver jobs.
For each job, the GPU usage is aggregated. For example, if a job used 1000 GPUs for one minute, it would be aggregated as 1000 GPU minutes or 16.67 GPU hours.

label: Job Size: Max (Core Count)
description:
The maximum size Screwdriver job in number of cores.
Job Size: The total number of processor cores used by a (parallel) job.

label: Job Size: Min (Core Count)
description:
The minimum size Screwdriver job in number of cores.
Job Size: The total number of processor cores used by a (parallel) job.

label: Job Size: Normalized (% of Total Cores)
description:
The percentage average size Screwdriver job over total machine cores.
Normalized Job Size: The percentage total number of processor cores used by a (parallel) job over the total number of cores on the machine.

label: Job Size: Per Job (Core Count)
description:
The average job size per Screwdriver job.
Job Size: The number of processor cores used by a (parallel) job.

label: Job Size: Weighted By CPU Hours (Core Count)
description:
The average Screwdriver job size weighted by CPU Hours. Defined as
Average Job Size Weighted By CPU Hours: sum(i = 0 to n){ job i core count * job i cpu hours}/sum(i = 0 to n){job i cpu hours}

label: Job Size: Weighted By GPU Hours (GPU Count)
description:
The average Screwdriver job size weighted by GPU Hours. Defined as
Average Job Size Weighted By GPU Hours: sum(i = 0 to n){ job i core count * job i gpu hours}/sum(i = 0 to n){job i gpu hours}

label: Node Hours: Per Job
description: The average node hours (number of nodes x wall time hours) per Screwdriver job.

label: Node Hours: Total
description: The total node hours (number of nodes x wall time hours) used by Screwdriver jobs.

label: Number of Jobs Ended
description: The total number of Screwdriver jobs that ended within the selected duration.

label: Number of Jobs Running
description: The total number of Screwdriver jobs that are running.

label: Number of Jobs Started
description: The total number of Screwdriver jobs that started executing within the selected duration.

label: Number of Jobs Submitted
description: The total number of Screwdriver jobs that submitted/queued within the selected duration.<i>

label: Number of PIs: Active
description: The total number of PIs that used Screwdriver resources.

label: Number of Resources: Active
description: The total number of active Screwdriver resources.

label: Number of Users: Active
description: The total number of users that used Screwdriver resources.

label: Screwdriver Utilization (%)
description:
The percentage of core time that a resource has been running jobs.
Screwdriver Utilization: The ratio of the total CPU hours consumed by jobs over a given time period divided by the maximum CPU hours that the system could deliver (based on the number of cores present on the resources). This value does not take into account downtimes or outages. It is just calculated based on the number of cores in the resource specifications.

label: User Expansion Factor
description:
The average job size per Screwdriver job.
Job Size: The number of processor cores used by a (parallel) job.

label: Wait Hours: Per Job
description:
The average time, in hours, a Screwdriver job waits before execution on the designated resource.
Wait Time: Wait time is defined as the linear time between submission of a job by a user until it begins to execute.

label: Wait Hours: Total
description:
The total time, in hours, Screwdriver jobs waited before execution on their designated resource.
Wait Time: Wait time is defined as the linear time between submission of a job by a user until it begins to execute.

label: Wall Hours: Per Job
description:
The average time, in hours, a job takes to execute.
In timeseries view mode, the statistic shows the average wall time per job per time period. In aggregate view mode the statistic only includes the job wall hours between the defined time range. The wall hours outside the time range are not included in the calculation.
Wall Time: Wall time is defined as the linear time between start and end time of execution for a particular job.

label: Wall Hours: Total
description:
The total time, in hours, Screwdriver jobs took to execute.
Wall Time: Wall time is defined as the linear time between start and end time of execution for a particular job.
